name: MC OUTDOOR, LLC and Chester County Outdoor, LLC, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and the Office of the Attorney General, by Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees

parties: MC OUTDOOR, LLC and Chester County Outdoor, LLC, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and the Office of the Attorney General, by Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of May, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 1234
MC OUTDOOR, LLC and Chester County Outdoor, LLC, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and the Office of the Attorney General, by Kathleen G. Kane, Attorney General, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 13, 2014.
